com.collective.celos

Class FileSystemStateDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.collective.celos.FileSystemStateDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateDatabase

    public class FileSystemStateDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateDatabase
    Brutally simple persistent implementation of StateDatabase that stores slot states as JSON files in the file system. The database has a top-level directory. Inside it, there is a subdirectory for each workflow. Inside each workflow directory is one directory per day. Inside each day directory is one JSON file per workflow run. / workflow-1/ 2013-12-02/ 16:00:00.000Z 17:00:00.000Z ... workflow-2/ 2013-12-02/ 16:00:00.000Z 17:00:00.000Z ... ... A JSON file looks like this: {"status":"WAITING"} or {"status":"RUNNING","externalID":"23873218-13202130978213-W"}

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemStateDatabase(java.io.File dir)
      Creates a new DB that stores data in the given directory, which must exist.
